title: Digital Systems Design I
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 204 (Cegep Mathematics 105).

title: Introduction to Discrete Mathematics
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 204 (Cegep Mathematics 105).

title: Programming Methodology I
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 204 (Cegep Mathematics 105).

title: Programming Methodology II
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 243 or MECH 215 or MIAE 215.

title: Computer Organization and Software
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 212, COEN 243.

title: Digital Systems Design II
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 212, COEN 231.

title: Digital Electronics I
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 212; ELEC 273.

title: Computer Architecture and Design
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 311, COEN 313.

title: Microprocessor‑Based Systems
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 311 or COMP 228 or SOEN 228; COEN 313.

title: Introduction to Real‑Time Systems
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 346 or COMP 346.

title: Operating Systems
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 311; COMP 352 or COEN 352.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 231, COEN 244.

title: Communication Networks and Protocols
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 346.

title: Computer Engineering Product Design Project
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 311, COEN 352; ENGR 290. Students must complete a minimum of 45 credits in the BEng (Computer) prior to enrolling.

title: Hardware Functional Verification
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 313.

title: Digital Electronics II
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 314.

title: Embedded Systems Design
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 317, COEN 320; SOEN 341.

title: Foundations of Cyber‑Physical Systems
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 346; ELEC 372.

title: Programming on the Cloud
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 346.

title: Applied Machine Learning and Evolutionary Algorithms
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 352 or COMP 352.

title: Biological Computing and Synthetic Biology
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 212, COEN 244.

title: Microfluidic Devices for Synthetic Biology
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 244 and ENGR 290; or BIOL 261 and COMP 249.

title: Internet of Things
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: COEN 366 or 445 or ELEC 366 or 463.

title: Software‑Defined Networking
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 317; COEN 366 or 445 or ELEC 366 or 463.

title: Software Testing and Validation
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: SOEN 341.

title: VLSI Circuit Design
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 212; ELEC 311 or COEN 314.

title: Capstone Computer Engineering Design Project
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be complete previously: ENGR 301, ENGR 371; COEN 390; SOEN 341. Students must complete a minimum of 75 credits in the BEng (Computer), as well as the C.Edge work term or one co-op work term prior to enrolling. If prerequisites are not satisfied, permission of the Department is required.

title: Topics in Computer Engineering
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the Department is required.
